1.3.1.name: wordpress/croissanga
1.3.1.description:
Croissanga is a WordPress plugin that gives you the ability to add, edit, and delete your Xanga posts directly from WordPress. This is often called 'cross-posting.' You need a Xanga account to use this plugin.

Croissanga's home on the web can be found at http://ryanlee.org/software/wp/croissanga/

Please inform me of any global configuration variables it would help you to have in case something like a drastic upgrade occurs again.
